    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0031115</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Tipos de huesos</string>
            <string language="en">Types of bones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der Knochen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types d'os</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de ossos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di ossa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι κόκκαλων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Clasifica los huesos en largos, cortos y planos. Contiene una imagen de los nombre de los principales huesos del esqueleto.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic which classifies bones into long, short and flat bones. It presents an image with the names of the main bones in the skeleton</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">huesos</string>
            <string language="en">bones</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das Knochen in die langen, kurzen und 
flachen Knochen einstuft. Es stellt ein Bild mit den Namen der 
Hauptknochen im Skelett dar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet qui classifie des os dans de longs, courts 
et plats os. Il présente une image avec les noms des os 
principaux dans le squelette</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que classifica os ossos nos ossos longos,
curtos e lisos. Apresenta uma imagem com os nomes dos ossos 
principais no esqueleto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che classifica le ossa nelle ossa 
lunghe, corte e piane. Presenta un'immagine con i nomi delle 
ossa principali nello scheletro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που ταξινομεί τα κόκκαλα πολύ, απότομα και τα 
επίπεδα κόκκαλα. Παρουσιάζει μια εικόνα με τα ονόματα των 
βασικών κόκκαλων στο σκελετό</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
